column1: Calceta is a town in the Manabí province of Ecuador.
Situated on the banks of the Carrizal river
column2: and surrounded a valley of the same name
column3: Calceta is a center of trade and services for the north-central zone of Manabí. It has a dozen high schools and more than twenty schools. 3 kilometres away is the Escuela Superior Politécnica de Manabí (ESPAM)
column4: a modern agricultural and environmental university.
